Good news this release. We've put a lot of effort and love into this, and we're excited to finally share it with you:
In this release we've added KYC; now you can verify your account right on the app. We have updated the interface for notifications, affiliate, account, trades and so on. 
PIN code screen now has a new look and extra stability with Touch and Face ID. By the way, don't forget to turn it on in your account settings, if you haven't done already.
This version also includes some bug fixes
and performance improvements. Enjoy!
If you have any questions or comments,
please write to us at apps@paxful.com

Good news this release. We've put a lot of effort and love into this, and we're excited to finally share it with you:

In this release we've added KYC; now you can verify your account right on the app. We have updated the interface for notifications, affiliate, account, trades and so on. 

PIN code screen now has a new look and extra stability with Touch and Face ID. By the way, don't forget to turn it on in your account settings, if you haven't done already.

This version also includes some bug fixes
and performance improvements. Enjoy!

If you have any questions or comments,
please write to us at apps@paxful.com

It’s a very merry time of the year, and in line with this Holiday spirit, we have added some visuals to make your experience on the app a little more festive.

Our wallet dashboard now has a fresh new look. Hope you like it!

We have also made some minor bug fixes and performance improvements to improve your overall experience on the app.

We are happy to bring you the next set of updates as we constantly try to improve the app and your experience using it. We have added notification settings, so now you can choose to receive SMS or Push about trades and wallet activity. We have also made our security questions more robust. And as always, we have made several bug fixes and more under-the-hood improvements to make your Paxful experience even smoother.
Small improvements.
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Minor improvements

We are happy to bring you the next set of updates as we constantly try to improve the app and your experience using it.
You can now verify your ID as soon as you start sending bitcoin from your wallet.
And as always, we have made several bug fixes and more under-the-hood improvements to make your Paxful experience even smoother.

We've been working hard to improve the app and your experience using it. This time around, we've fixed an issue where some of you may not have been able to restore your password. 
And as always, we've made several bug fixes and more under-the-hood improvements to make your Paxful experience even smoother.

We've been working hard to improve the app and your experience using it. 
This time around, we've introduced a new wallet interface. 
And as always, we've made several bug fixes and more under-the-hood improvements to make your Paxful experience even smoother.

Paxful just turned 5 years old—It’s party time!
We want to invite everyone to join our celebration. 
Let’s start with some awesome updates on how we’re making your experience on Paxful even better. 
In this version, we are fixing a few issues that caused crashes from the previous release.

Your Paxful app just got a whole lot better, Here’s what’s new!
We’ve added a new homepage feature, where you can find all your Paxful stats in one place. We’ve also improved your wallet send out flow to make sending Bitcoin to other users easier!
As always, we’ve made some performance improvements under the hood and squished some bugs along the way.

Paxful is back at it again with new updates to your wallet.

You can now directly send crypto to another Paxful user simply by their username. How easy is that!

And as always, we’ve made some performance improvements under the hood and squashed some bugs along the way.

Paxful is back at it again with new updates to your wallet.

You can now directly send crypto to another Paxful user simply by their username. How easy is that!

And as always, we’ve made some performance improvements under the hood and squashed some bugs along the way.

Paxful’s back - alright! 
Admittedly we love boy band references as much as we love updates, and boy do we have some.
This time around we’ve done quite a bit of restyling. We’ve improved how you convert your money from once crypto into another,  made some updates to the home screen and wallet, and fully integrated the marketplace to the app. That’s right! Now you can explore offers on the app.
And as always we’ve squashed some bugs along the way - most importantly the problem where the app wouldn’t completely load for some of you.

Paxful’s back - alright! 
Admittedly we love boy band references as much as we love updates, and boy do we have some.
This time we’ve added some cool things to your app. Such as being able to convert from one crypto into another and video verification. That’s right! You’ll be able to verify yourself via video right on the app.
And as always, we’ve made some performance improvements under the hood and squashed some bugs along the way.

Jingle bells, Paxful sells—updates on the way! 

Most of these are small design updates, although two are worth a special shoutout. Finally, you’ll be able to send and receive Tether right from your Paxful app. You’ll also be able to hide your account balances—giving you more privacy than ever.

And as always, we’ve squashed some bugs along the way.

Most of these are small design updates, although two are worth a special shoutout. Finally, you’ll be able to send and receive Tether right from your Paxful app. You’ll also be able to hide your account balances—giving you more privacy than ever.

And as always, we’ve squashed some bugs along the way.
